question: {"explanation":"Let the tens and unit digits be x and y respectively. Thus, both I and II are needed to get the answer.","explanationImage":"","question":"Each of the questions given below consists of statements numbered I and II given below it. question: {"explanation":"T’s age = Total age – sum of the age of (P + Q + R + S) Total age = 5 × 55 = 275 years Now, from I, P + Q = 2 × 65 =130 years From II,R + S = 2 × 60 = 120 yearsFrom (A) and (B), P + Q + R + S = 130 + 120 = 250 years.
